p: The lower MIC value was demonstrated for P. furfuracea and E. prunastri in the SARM strain N°1 (0.039 mg/mL), and the higher MBC value was found for E. prunastri in Listeria innocua (2.5 mg/mL). Overall, the MIC values obtained for the acetone extract of P. furfuracea were lower than those obtained with extracts of E.prunastri and R.farinacea.
